channel.title: Currently-Reading on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Currently-Reading on Strat

item.title: Ash - A Secret History
item.description: A recommendation by Adrian Tchaikovsky himself, let’s see how it goes.

item.title: The Word For World Is Forest
item.description:
Seems like Ursula K. Le Guin is subverting the old school military science-fiction trope of humans going around killing “aliens” with the humans doing the killing framed as the good guys who we’re supposed to be rooting for. Maybe colonialism is bad?

Let’s see how this goes.

item.title: Taoism - The Parting Of The Way
item.description:
This is the book on Daoism that Ursula K. Le Guin recommends in her rendition of the Tao Te Ching for anyone who reads the Tao Te Ching and wants to learn more about Daoism.

I’m about a 1/3 of my way through the text. The first Appendix got a good chuckle out of me. The text is pretty much exactly what you might expect and with Ursula K. Le Guin’s seal of approval, I’m expecting the rest of it to be just as good.
